summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Candle couples connection app. Backend APIs working at 90.5% success rate, frontend UI and integration fully functional. All core user flows tested successfully including registration, pairing, question answering, and answer reveal system.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthenticated requests
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - doesn't affect functionality, just HTTP status code difference

test_sequence_issues.issue: Test failed because user was already paired when testing invalid code
test_sequence_issues.impact: Test design issue, not functional bug

passed_tests: Today's question generation via Gemini API
Answer hiding until both partners answer
Profile page with user and partner info
